column3: An app for Android that displays bus route and stop information, as well as bus times.
Look up the bus stop schedule for KW region, On, Canada.

column1: | Rotate your phone to browse all the stops on map
| Locate the stops near you on the fly
| View a route's path by tapping on a schedule time

column3: Android app to tell you when the next bus is coming.
A mobile-friendly web application with tools for finding nearby stops and next buses, viewing route maps, and more! Works on most major desktop and mobile browsers.
